Impatient.Name: Impatient
Impatient.Commentary: says the char is an archer going to fight another archer both side starts out of range so shooting right away is beyond stupid but the char being impatient he will need to make will check to resist his desire to fire right away and wasting all his arrows thereby letting his opponent win instantly

Kindhearted.Name: Kindhearted
Kindhearted.Commentary: when a foe surrender and beg for his life make a will check to resist falling in for your own kindness and let your foe go

Discriminatory_Specific.Name: Specific Discrimination
Discriminatory_Specific.Description: The character only dislike one particular nationality, ethnicity, species; eg: dislike just rascieran but ok with other nationality

Blunt.Name: Blunt
Blunt.Description: The character don't sugarcoat anything and say exactly what he think

Competitive.Name: Competitive
Competitive.Description: like to compete and win, dislike losing

Curious.Name: Curious
Curious.Description: When you are presented with an interesting item or situation, you must roll vs. Will to avoid examining it

Obsession.Name: Obsession
Obsession.Description: Your will is fixed upon a single goal. Everything you do is intended to further this goal

Charitable.Name: Charitable
Charitable.Description: make will check to resist money begging

Greedy.Name: Greedy
Greedy.Description: make will check to resist bribe or deal that would give them sizable money relative to their wealth

Stingy.Name: Stingy
Stingy.Description: somewhat relate to greedy but differs in that greedy person wants to "earn" more and more wealth but can still be a big spender, stingy person on the other hand wants to "hoard wealth and didn't want to spend them" but doesn't necessarily want to "earn" more and more wealth like greedy person do; make will check to spend money even if it is something the character urgently needed, bonus to discount rate

Extravagant.Name: Extravagant
Extravagant.Description: make will check to resist buying everything

Gluttony.Name: Gluttony
Gluttony.Commentary: Gluttony is different from Compulsive Behavior Eating

Bloodlust.Name: Bloodlust
Bloodlust.Description: the character will kill any foe that he engages in a fight unless he pass a will check to restrain his urge to kill, if he didn’t attempt the roll or failed the roll he will kill his foe even if it mean breaking the law, violating the order, or getting him killed later

Berserk.Name: Berserk
Berserk.Description: the character might go berserk in combat and temporarily lose his sanity, attacking both friends and foes

Pacifist.Name: Pacifist
Pacifist.Description: try to discourage people from starting a fight

SelfDefenseOnly.Name: Self Defense Only
SelfDefenseOnly.Description: wont start fight even if provoked, can still start fight if the provocation or situation were extremely severe or dangerous if not act

ReluctantFighter.Name: Reluctant Fighter
ReluctantFighter.Description: reluctant in injuring other person (only target he considers a person; not monster or machine unless he considered said monster a person)

ReluctantKiller.Name: Reluctant Killer
ReluctantKiller.Description: reluctant in killing other person (only target he considers a person; not monster or machine unless he considered said monster a person) he would prefer knocking out his opponent instead of killing him

NeverKill.Name: Won't Kill
NeverKill.Description: will suffer mental breakdown when killing or feeling responsible for someone's death

Stubborn.Name: Stubborn
Stubborn.Description: need to be persuade, bluff, fast talk , intimidate, misled , lied into doing something the character disagree with
